name: Plat Maven
description:
Here's a super short but difficult 3D platforming course I made while learning Unreal Engine. Take Plat Maven to the finish as fast as you can ! Don't fall into the void ! Think you can beat my best time of 1:42.51 ???

The following buttons do things when you press them:

You can jump with spacebar or the bottom face button. (Protip: tap the button for shorthops. Hold the button down longer for some major air !)

You can move with WASD or the left thumbstick.

You can quick reset with R or the top face button.

You can pause with Esc or the start button.

I took the character model and animations from Kenney and the textures from the Doom custom texture pack Cage's Texture Pack Vol. 2. The character texture and sounds were made by me. I'm Spacious Barn.
